nostrlogin-config-domains: A list of NIP-05 https://github.com/nostr-protocol/nips/blob/master/05.md domains to choose from.
nostrlogin-desc: Extension to allow login via Nostr signing browser extensions (according to NIP-07 https://github.com/nostr-protocol/nips/blob/master/07.md).
nostrlogin-loginfield-nip05: Nostr identification provider domain (according to NIP-05 https://github.com/nostr-protocol/nips/blob/master/05.md - On which website did you create your Nostr account?)
